Text:
So even if they're not difficult or technical, to put
it in an extreme way, there are books which get
labelled pointless, trash, or vulgar―

Even if each book contains questionable things,
I think that there are universal truths that can
be seen when all of that junk wisdom is piled
together.

Even if it is all junk, when you pile them together,
you can see universal...truths?

Yup. No one can decide the value of wisdom. The more
wisdom you have the better, don't you think?

I didn’t get scolded...on the contrary, Master Shadow
said that being on a mission doesn't mean I have to
only read difficult books. That it's also wisdom...

Wisdom...? I see. So Master Shadow was giving me
wisdom those times...

I didn't understand why he was telling me fairy tales
before, but now...just a little, I feel that I understand
Master Shadow’s intentions...
Could it be...?

There aren't really any signs of any incidents. There
doesn't seem to be any moves being made by the Cult
of Diablos.

This is a historical city, but it isn't particularly
economically or politically powerful.

The mission was to gather intel at the city library.
Did that mean reading the books I wanted to read...?

Then, I discovered more fairy tales, more stories, to
build up my own wisdom... And from that wisdom,
determine the truth... I see!

Could it be...? Was Lady Alpha thinking of me, and
that's why she put me on this mission...?

And also, Master Shadow started reading me fairy
tales, with the expectation that I would reach this
conclusion... That's why.

It was... It was all connected... Is this Master
Shadow's foresight?!
...And that finishes my report on my latest mission.

Hmm... By the way...you've got a smirk on your face.
Did something good happen?

Um, yes! Not so much good, but...something
happened.

That is to say, there are so many interesting stories
in the world. I rediscovered that while on my mission,
and as a result I gained a lot of wisdom!
That's good.

By the way, since you returned from your intel-
gathering mission, have I been feeling your
eyes on me, or am I imagining things?

Th-That's your imagination. Definitely!
...I-I need to go now!
As expected, Master Shadow... He noticed...
Did you think he is the only one who has noticed?
Lady Alpha...?!

You were so nervous around Shadow before, but what
is this curious turn of events...

Since returning from that last mission, you have been
like his shadow. Even he seems a bit...perplexed?
...I-I'm sorry. I wasn’t trying to sneak around.

I am not saying you are doing something wrong. But if
you can, I would like you to tell me what happened.
That's all.

Well... I guess I might have kind of developed a
longing.
A longing...? For Shadow?

For the fairy tales Master Shadow told me. And the
many stories I discovered in the library during my
last mission.

They all represent wisdom, and if you bring together
all that wisdom, it becomes strength.

I'm pretty sure that is what Master Shadow wanted to
say to me.

Maybe it's all in my head. But...I want to gain more
wisdom.

So I want to try and absorb Master Shadow's every
movement, every word that comes out of his mouth.
That's what I was thinking anyway.
D-Did I say something strange?

You thought he was so frightening, but you have
really gotten used to him.

Oh, also. I read your report. Some of it was all over
the place, but it was well summarized. I think you
might have a talent for writing.

So here is my suggestion. Can you summarize Shadow's
actions and words in your own style of writing?

Me? Summarize the actions of Master Shadow...?
H-He is too majestic for that!

But you want to absorb everything he says and does,
don't you? If that is the case, don't you think it should
first be written down?

Th-That is true, but...um, I don't know if I have
what it takes to do it.

(From that day, I started taking notes on everything
Master Shadow did.)

(I'm not confident I can put everything into proper
sentences. But for now I want to record every tiny
detail.)

(A day or two passed, and then months, after I
started thinking like that.)

This is a problem. I was writing down all the great
things about Master Shadow, but somehow it's
turned into this...

Volumes and volumes of notebooks are spread all over
my desk. Each notebook contains the everyday activities
of Master Shadow.

My notes keep increasing, so I need to think of a
way to organize them. But the rate at which they
are increasing is getting faster and faster...

It is just as Lady Alpha said, but it's strange.
I was so scared of Master Shadow, but now
I need his existence.

Heheh, when I look at this note or that note, I can
vividly remember the scenes they describe... How
Master Shadow spoke, or how he fought...

This is like a story... No, like a legend... Or maybe
this is the story of a god? That's it. Can I compile
these little notes into a story?
Is this how stories become legends?!

B-But if I just record it, audacious as it is, can I
turn that into a story...?
I think that you have a talent for writing.
Maybe I can do this...
